name: Cookie Clicker Idle - Best Clickers & Idle Game
name_original: Cookie Clicker Idle - Best Clickers & Idle Game
description:
Cookie Clicker Idle - The best clicker and idle game

Get ready and bake as many cookies as you can to crow your big cookie business

Let the Cookies rain - The most exciting idle cookie clicker crush on your phone.

Will you be the best at cookie clicker and win a surprise ?
